alternative_title: Check if a university is an officially recognised body or offering recognised degrees as a listed body
body:
$! Higher learning institutions that are officially recognised in the UK are called either 'recognised' or 'listed' bodies $!

Recognised bodies are institutions that can award their own degrees. Listed bodies offer courses that can lead to a degree from a recognised body. 

Check if a university or higher learning institution is a [recognised body](http://www.bis.gov.uk/policies/higher-education/recognised-uk-degrees/recognised-bodies "BIS: Recognised bodies"){:rel="external"} or a [listed body.](http://www.bis.gov.uk/policies/higher-education/recognised-uk-degrees/listed-bodies "BIS: Listed bodies"){:rel="external"}

%If your degree's awarded in the UK, it must come from a recognised or listed body - if it doesn't, it will be considered bogus and won't count when you're looking for a job.%
overview: Recognised bodies, listed bodies, recognised universities, accredited higher learning institutions, bogus degrees
title: Check a university or institution is officially recognised
